member.name: T:SystemTools.LogManager
member.summary: Used to create and write Log files.

member.name: M:SystemTools.LogManager.WriteInfo(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes an info message into the log file while in DEBUG mode.
member.param: The info message which should be written.
member.exception: Will be thrown if the system is unable to open and write into the log file.

member.name: M:SystemTools.LogManager.WriteWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a warning message into the log file.
member.param: The warning message which should be written.
member.exception: Will be thrown if the system is unable to open and write into the log file.

member.name: M:SystemTools.LogManager.WriteError(System.String)
member.summary: Writes an error message into the log file.
member.param: The error message which should be written.
member.exception: Will be thrown if the system is unable to open and write into the log file.

member.name: M:SystemTools.LogManager.PrintToFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prints available data into the log file.
member.exception: Will be thrown if the system is unable to open and write into the log file.

member.name: M:SystemTools.LogManager.PrintFileHeader(System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.exception: Will be thrown if the system is unable to open and write into the log file.
